snippet: The campaign now moves to three states - South Carolina, Florida and Nevada - hit hard by the recession, which could prove a challenge for Mitt Romney.
abstract: The campaign now moves to three states - South Carolina, Florida and Nevada - hit hard by the recession, which could prove a challenge for Mitt Romney.
lead_paragraph: Now comes the economic-bust phase of the Republican primaries.

headline.main: Primary Race Moves to Economically Strapped States
